summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Gaziantep Kuzu Lahmacun Turkish restaurant website. All major features working correctly including hero section, floating buttons, menu filtering, reviews carousel, contact section, mobile responsiveness, and SEO optimization.

navigation_issues.issue: Menu and About section navigation scrolling doesn't position elements perfectly in viewport
navigation_issues.details: Reviews and Contact navigation work correctly, but Menu and About sections need scroll offset adjustment

navigation_issues.issue: Scroll arrow element instability prevents reliable clicking due to animations
navigation_issues.details: Element becomes unstable during animations, making automated clicking difficult

passed_tests: Hero section displays correctly with animated logo, tagline, and CTA buttons
Floating WhatsApp button links to https://wa.me/905323016334
Floating Call button links to tel:05323016334
Menu tab filtering works correctly for all 8 categories (Tümü, Lahmacun, Pide, Salata, Çorba, Diğer, Tatlılar, İçecekler)
Reviews carousel displays 5 customer reviews with Google badges and navigation
Contact section shows correct address, phone numbers, and Instagram link
Google Maps iframe loads correctly with proper src
All buttons (Hemen Ara, WhatsApp Sipariş, Instagram) are clickable with correct hrefs
Mobile menu hamburger works correctly on mobile viewport
Mobile responsiveness - all elements adapt properly to mobile screen
SEO meta tags are comprehensive (title, description, keywords, OG, Twitter)
Schema.org JSON-LD markup is present and complete for restaurant data
Navigation to Reviews and Contact sections works correctly
Footer social links work with correct hrefs
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor navigation scrolling improvements needed: adjust scroll offset for Menu and About sections to ensure elements are properly centered in viewport after navigation. Consider reducing scroll arrow animation intensity to improve stability.
success_percentage: frontend: 95% - All major functionality working, minor navigation scrolling issues
